roleset.name: disclaim relationship to
roleset.note: DISOWN-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from disown.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: With a pardonable irony Shelley wrote to the father who [*T*-1] had publiclydisowned his daughter : `` Fanny and Mrs. Godwin will probably be glad [*]tohear that Mary has safely recovered from a very favorable confinement , andthat her child is well '' .
